message: I have a high-quality product that I'm willing to sell to you for $1000000. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident that you'll find it to be a valuable addition to your collection. Would you like to purchase it?
I'm not convinced by your claim. I'd like to wait and see what the next product is.

I'll take the 50/50 chance. I'll buy the product.
